titles.title: A bill to provide funding for the development of a predictive analytics pilot program to help children and families who come to the attention of the child welfare system.
Using Data To Help Protect Children and Families Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
